Services

Professional single- and double-glazed aluminium joinery repairs and replacements across Wellington.

i

Sliding/Ranchslider Door Repairs

Rollers, tracks, alignment, door handles & locks.
We replace worn rollers, repair dented tracks, re‑align doors and service door handles/locks for smooth sliding. Learn more
i

Aluminium Window Repairs

Stays, hinges, latches & draft fixes.
Fix rattles and drafts, replace stays/hinges, adjust latches and seal gaps. Learn more
i

Mitre & Sill Reseal (Leaks)

Stops leaks at mitred corners & sills.
Open the joinery, back-seal mitres, re-seal sills, keep drainage open, hose-test. Learn more
i

Stays & Hinges

Awning stays, restrictors & hinge service.
Replace bent awning stays and fit restrictors; windows open, hold position and seal properly. Learn more
i

Draughts & Leaks

Seal, wedge and alignment fixes.
Replace glazing wedges/seals and re‑align sashes to stop drafts and leaks. Learn more
i

Security Stays

Limit opening for safety & security.
Install restrictors to limit opening for child safety and ground‑floor security. Learn more
i

Hardware & Wedge Replacement

Window/door handles, Yale window locks, wedges & seals.
Supply and fit window handles, door handles, Yale window locks, safety stays, wedges and seals matched to your joinery. Learn more
